meta.name: description
meta.content: A leader in urban education in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania. Serving more than 11,000 students, our district is known for its rich diversity, broad academic offerings and highly professional faculty and staff.

a.span:
The School District of Lancaster is committed to providing our families and community with regular and timely updates on COVID-19, or Coronavirus. All district updates are published on a dedicated webpage on this site.
Coronavirus Updates

img.br: Make a difference! The School District of Lancaster is looking for talented, committed professionals to join our team. Immediate openings in leadership, teaching and support staff!

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-23

img.br: Welcome McCaskey Class of 2033! All children who will be 5 years of age on or before September 1, 2020 and reside in Lancaster City or Lancaster Township are eligible to enroll in kindergarten for the 2020-2021 school year. Make an appointment in our enrollment office!

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-22

img.br: Pre-kindergarten applications now open! All children who will be 4 years of age on or before September 1, 2020 and reside in Lancaster City or Lancaster Township are eligible to apply for pre-k for the 2020-2021 school year. Spaces are limited and assigned based on need.

article.class: post-28701 page type-page status-publish hentry entry

div.p: Schools in the School District of Lancaster are closed indefinitely and the district is providing at-home enrichment, review and instruction while working with local, state and national leaders to combat the global spread of COVID-19, or coronavirus. All district updates, resources for on at-home learning and general information about the illness are on a dedicated webpage on this site.

School District of Lancaster teachers are providing enrichment and review for students while at home. Work may include packets, online resources, and/or virtual instruction to reinforce or extend students’ prior learning.

We continue to provide as many services as possible, including free meals (distributed Tuesdays and Thursdays) and healthcare at the clinic based at JP McCaskey (by appointment). Visit our Student Services page and use the dedicated forms to connect directly with a school counselor or social worker.

Thankfully, Lancaster is a city with many community partners who want to help in this uncertain and challenging time. SDoL's student services team is compiling a list of resources where families can find additional support during the COVID-19 outbreak.

With students unable to attend school and participating in remote learning, it is vital for the School District of Lancaster to have correct mailing addresses for all families. SDoL mails work packets to elementary students at the addresses in our system. If your address has changed, and you have not yet updated the school district, please complete the form below. You are able to use your phone camera to provide proof of residency. Thank you!

div.h2: School board to hold virtual community budget meeting April 14
div.p: The School District of Lancaster board of directors invites district residents to participate virtually in a community budget meeting on Tuesday. The meeting will begin at 6 p.m. and will feature a presentation on the district’s finances by Matthew Przywara, chief of finance and operations. Previously, the district faced a deficit of some $10 million […]

a.title: School board to hold virtual community budget meeting April 14

div.h2: Vote in SDoL’s census art contest!
div.p: SDoL student artists participated in a contest to design ads promoting participation in the 2020 census. Now YOU can vote on the winners! Click here to vote The contest will run through April 24. Winners will be announced on the district website and social media. The contest was originally planned to conclude March 13, when […]

a.title: Vote in SDoL’s census art contest!

svg.desc: Used for the like, share, comment, and reaction icons

img.alt: HUGE shout out to the many staff members who made this possible! #SDoLProud

p.span: HUGE shout out to the many staff members who made this possible! #SDoLProud

div.p: Thank you to the wonderful employees and volunteers that made this happen 👏🏼 so awesome
Thank you all for your time & support! Very appreciated 🤗🤗
Our students succeed when families thrive. Find resources for parents/guardians on topics including attendance, counseling, college/career preparation, mental health and healthcare.
Our schools are the cornerstone of a great community. Learn more about partnership opportunities for community organizations and ways individuals and groups can volunteer to support our students.
We are proud to be responsible stewards of our community resources. Learn about our district budget priorities, facilities investments, real estate taxes and sponsorship opportunities.

Learn more about the McCaskey Alumni Association, one of the most active high school alumni groups in the US, and the Lancaster Education Foundation, supporting teaching excellence and student success in SDoL.

All events in the School District of Lancaster are on hiatus at the order of the governor. At this time, schools are closed indefinitely. Missed activities may be rescheduled and/or canceled depending on if and when school can resume as normal.

The events below and the full calendar reflect the district’s original schedule. When we are confident we can resume activities, we will update the calendar to reflect the revised schedule. Thank you for your understanding.

$(document).ready(function() { $(".school-choice-one .gfield_select").change(function() { // Get the selected value var selected = $("option:selected", $(this)).val(); // Get the ID of this element var thisID = $(this).attr("id"); // Reset so all values are showing: $(".school-choice-one .gfield_select option").each(function() { $(this).show(); }); $(".school-choice-one .gfield_select").each(function() { if ($(this).attr("id") != thisID) { $("option[value='" + selected + "']", $(this)).attr( "disabled", "disabled" ).siblings().removeAttr("disabled"); } }); }); $(".school-choice-two .gfield_select").change(function() { var selected = $("option:selected", $(this)).val(); var thisID = $(this).attr("id"); $(".school-choice-two .gfield_select option").each(function() { $(this).show(); } }); }); $(".school-choice-three .gfield_select").change(function() { var selected = $("option:selected", $(this)).val(); var thisID = $(this).attr("id"); $(".school-choice-three .gfield_select option").each(function() { $(this).show(); }); $(".school-choice-three .gfield_select").each(function() { if ($(this).attr("id") != thisID) { $("option[value='" + selected + "']", $(this)).attr( "disabled", "disabled" ).siblings().removeAttr("disabled"); } }); }); $(".school-choice-four .gfield_select").change(function() { var selected = $("option:selected", $(this)).val(); var thisID = $(this).attr("id"); $(".school-choice-four .gfield_select option").each(function() { $(this).show(); } }); }); $(".school-choice-five .gfield_select").change(function() { var selected = $("option:selected", $(this)).val(); var thisID = $(this).attr("id"); $(".school-choice-five .gfield_select option").each(function() { $(this).show();
